sentences: Ta tundis end nagu tüdruk, kes ei oska midagi.
Kui tüdruku vanemad said teada, et tema tütar on abiellunud.
context: The word tüdruk is commonly used in Estonian to refer to a young female person, and it can be translated to English as girl or young woman. It is often used in informal settings and can have different connotations depending on the context.
